con:restRequest.name: ProcessMarketingEventLocationBonus

con:elements.con:expectedValue: All enrolled members with an active profile status
Earn points for spending a minimum amount

"MomentResponseValues": [ { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "BASE INDICATOR", "ResponsePropertyValue": "N", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "ENGAGE INDICATOR", "ResponsePropertyValue": "Y", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "POINT SUBTYPE", "ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTSUBTYPEID}}", "Status": "P" }, { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "MomentType": "PROMOTIONAL_CURRENCY", "ResponsePropertyName": "POINT TYPE", "ResponsePropertyValue": "{{DEFAULTPOINTTYPEID}}", "Status": "P" } ], "MomentEvent": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "MomentQualifyingDateAttribute": "PurchaseTxn.TransactionDateTime", "MomentOffers": [ { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "Description": "{{DESCRIPTION}}", "MomentOutcome": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "OutcomeEquationUi": "{{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}", "CalculationTemplate": "<fixedpoints,[Number]>", "OutcomeEquationTemplate": "%5B%7B%22name%22%3A%22fixedpoints%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22Number%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22var%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22variable_0%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22{{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}}%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22drools%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22String.valueOf({{POINT_AMT_REWARDED}})%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D", "FormulaName": "FIXEDAMT", "Status": "A" }, "MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE}}", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null)) AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY profile_id )
